Class ApacheImplemntor

public class ApacheImplemntor
extends Implementor

Constructor Detail

ApacheImplemntor

public ApacheImplemntor(java.lang.String params)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
Constructor Initializes the pathes needed for implementor working from the json string with params that it got. Needed params: - "caCertFilePath" : the ca file of apache where the trusted certificate are - "serverCertFilePath": the certificate file of the server - "serverKeyFilePath": the file of the certificate of the server - "serverCRLFilePath": revocation list path

Parameters:
params - - json string with all params mentioned above
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

args -

genrateKeyPair

public java.security.cert.Certificate genrateKeyPair(java.lang.String dName,
                                                     java.lang.String alias)
                                              throws ImplementorExcption
Adapter for genartePrivatekey method Generates key public-private pair, stores the private key and returns a certificate. Certificate is in the X509 format.

Overrides:
genrateKeyPair in class Implementor
Parameters:
dName - - the full subject form of this certificate
alias - - unique alias for keystore entries
Returns:
Throws:
ImplementorExcption

installTrustCert

public boolean installTrustCert(java.security.cert.Certificate cert,
                                java.lang.String alias)
                         throws ImplementorExcption
Stores certificate as trusted. Gets certificate that Apache need to trust and inserts it into the the CaCertificatesFiles of apache (writes into file, where is the certificates that apache trusts stored )

Overrides:
installTrustCert in class Implementor
Parameters:
cert - - the certificate to trust
alias - - not relevant in this implementor
Returns:
true in success
Throws:
ImplementorExcption

genrateSecertKey

public javax.crypto.SecretKey genrateSecertKey(java.lang.String alg,
                                               java.lang.String alias)
                                        throws ImplementorExcption
Generates secret key. This method not supported in Apache implementor.

Overrides:
genrateSecertKey in class Implementor
Parameters:
alg - - algorithm
alias - - unique alias for keystore entries
Returns:
Throws:
ImplementorExcption

addToCrl

public boolean addToCrl(java.math.BigInteger serialNumber)
                 throws ImplementorExcption
Method for adding into CRL object new entries. If the CRL file does not exists yet - creates new. Otherwise copy all the existed entries from exists CRL, add the new entry according the serial number that we got and stores the file instead of exists.

Overrides:
addToCrl in class Implementor
Parameters:
- - serial number of certificate for revocation
Returns:
- true in success, otherwise throws an ImplementorExcption
Throws:
ImplementorExcption
